headline.print_headline: Recalls This Week: Wine Openers, Bicycles
headline.main: Recalls This Week: Wine Openers, Bicycles

lead_paragraph: A line of devices used to puncture a hole in a wine bottle cork are being recalled because they can cause the bottle to burst or crack. Other consumer products recalled this week include faulty bicycles and air conditioning systems with improper grounding.
